actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-980.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6412, a bill to authorize a supplement appropriation to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for Research and Development.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6412 (NASA funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6412, a bill to authorize a supplement appropriation to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for Research and Development.
